___ParentDomainID.description: The ID of the AdminDomain that this AdminDomain participates in

___Distributed.description: true if the services managed by the AdminDomain are geographically distributed

___Owner.description: Identification of persons or legal entities that own the resources in this AdminDomain

___StorageServiceID.description: IDs of StorageServices in this AdminDomain

___ServiceID.description: IDs of Services in this AdminDomain

___ChildDomainID.description: IDs of AdminDomains aggregated by this AdminDomain

___ComputingServiceID.description: IDs of ComputingServices in this AdminDomain
